thread.title: Love Island fans 'shocked' after discovering age gap between Elma and Sammy
thread.title_full: Love Island fans 'shocked' after discovering age gap between Elma and Sammy

author: Kinga Piotrowska
title: Love Island fans 'shocked' after discovering age gap between Elma and Sammy
text:
Love Island fans were stunned by the age gap between Elma Pazar and Sammy Root after the pair were seen together in the hideaway.
Sammy and Elma share a history, having first met on the TOWIE circuit before reuniting on last nightâ€™s episode of All Stars.
Rumours swirled in 2023 that the two were dating, shortly before Sammy was announced as a new TOWIE cast member.
During the latest episode, Sammy made his entrance as the newest bombshell and chose Elma to join him in the hideaway.
The pair were delighted to see each other and wasted no time catching up, appearing smitten as they sat together on the bed.
However, fans quickly pointed out their significant age difference.
Sammy is 23, while Elma is 32.
One viewer took to X to comment, saying, â€œIâ€™ve seen a lot of people saying Sammy and Elma because they were on TOWIE together? Mind you, he was 17 when Elma first went on Love Island. We need an age restriction of like 25 because thatâ€™s insane.â€
Sorry Elma is 32 and Sammy is 23 - ainâ€™t no way ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
â€” AJBðŸ¾ (@Anutweeted)[#loveisland][#LoveIslandAllStars][pic.twitter.com/ss5wdk2T4t][January 29, 2025]
Before entering the villa, Sammy had hinted that a romance with Elma could be on the cards when asked about reuniting with familiar faces.
So Sammy is 23 and Elma is 32. Thatâ€™s a BIG gap!
â€” Abigail (@yesindede)[#LoveIslandAllStars][pic.twitter.com/w62GX0Y12b][January 29, 2025]
At 32, Elma is nine years older than 23-year-old Sammy.
